name: COVID_19_HSP_INFECTIONS
description: COVID-19 infections associated with hospital encounters.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: INFECTION_START_DATE
columns.description: Date the COVID-19 infection was first identified.

columns.name: SOURCE_INFECTION_ID
columns.description: Source INF record for the COVID-19 infection for this encounter.

columns.name: INFECTION_START_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the COVID-19 infection was first identified.

columns.name: SUSP_INFECTION_START_DATE
columns.description: Date the COVID-19 infection was first suspected.

columns.name: SUSP_INFECTION_END_DATE
columns.description: Date the COVID-19 infection was no longer suspected.

columns.name: INFECTION_CONFIRMED_YN
columns.description: Whether or not a COVID-19 infection has been confirmed.
